text: I miss seeing my kids sports, I get the disappointment—but, @Sdimaso and @GovMurphy I’m still concerned about #grandparents & #greatgrandparents missing years of life due to #COVID19 deaths..so I’m thankful we’ve been cautious—eager for #vaccine campaign to help us out of this! https://t.co/lF2IXNm0Jg https://t.co/fQybA0P9Mj
